abstract: A small Chinese automaker and its New Jersey partner are negotiating with Mexican officials to import Chinese-made pickup trucks and sport utility vehicles.
snippet: A small Chinese automaker and its New Jersey partner are negotiating with Mexican officials to import Chinese-made pickup trucks and sport utility vehicles.
lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, June 14 — A small Chinese automaker and its New Jersey partner are negotiating with Mexican officials to import Chinese-made pickup trucks and sport utility vehicles, the first step toward establishing a beachhead in North America.

headline.main: Chinese in Talks to Send Pickups to Mexico
headline.print_headline: Chinese in Talks to Send Pickups to Mexico

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Utility Vehicles and Other Light Trucks
